channel.title: Qt.qpa.plugin: Could not find the Qt platform plugin "windows" in "". Compiling With nuitka (Help)?
channel.description:
So im putting this here to possibly get some help im using someones example python loader login system but built it into my project and compile the python files into and exe with nuitka and this is the problem i am running into if anyone could help i would highly appreciate it thank you.
What Im Using In CMD to compile to exe(nuitka --include-package-data=win32gui --include-package-data=win32con --onefile main.py)
Full Error: (qt.qpa.plugin: Could not find the Qt platform plugin "windows" in "" This application failed to start because no Qt platform plugin could be initialized. Reinstalling the application may fix this problem.)

item.title: Qt.qpa.plugin: Could not find the Qt platform plugin "windows" in "". Compiling With nuitka (Help)?
item.dc:creator: _Quando
item.description:
i have figured it out --plugin-enable=pyqt5 that was the solution thank you for all the help i really appreciate it

Read full topic
